svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" modified="2023-05-06T13:29:06.031Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/21.2.8 Chrome/112.0.5615.165 guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="1100" pageHeight="850" background="#ffffff" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="S0fAHx6TZ2YNJfECwpG4-2" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="51" y="33" width="539" height="457" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="VZzwR31vzTdnBh62rm7x-1" value="Verifier" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fontColor=#000000;fillColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#000000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="71" y="203" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="VZzwR31vzTdnBh62rm7x-2" value="Notation" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#000000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="271" y="203" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="VZzwR31vzTdnBh62rm7x-14" value="Notation trust policy file" style="shape=partialRectangle;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;left=0;right=0;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#000000;fontColor=#000000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="251" y="63" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="VZzwR31vzTdnBh62rm7x-19" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;fontColor=#050505;strokeColor=#000000;" parent="1" source="VZzwR31vzTdnBh62rm7x-1" target="VZzwR31vzTdnBh62rm7x-2" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="201" y="143" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="301" y="143" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="VZzwR31vzTdnBh62rm7x-20" value="1. Read&nbsp; registry <br>credentials" style="edgeLabel;resizable=0;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;" parent="VZzwR31vzTdnBh62rm7x-23" connectable="0" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-26" y="10" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="VZzwR31vzTdnBh62rm7x-32" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;fontColor=#000000;strokeColor=#000000;" parent="1" source="VZzwR31vzTdnBh62rm7x-14" target="VZzwR31vzTdnBh62rm7x-2" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="361" y="193" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="461" y="193" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="VZzwR31vzTdnBh62rm7x-33" value="4. Read trust policy<br>configuration" style="edgeLabel;resizable=0;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;" parent="VZzwR31vzTdnBh62rm7x-32" connectable="0" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint y="-6" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="VZzwR31vzTdnBh62rm7x-36" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=1;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="S0fAHx6TZ2YNJfECwpG4-25" target="VZzwR31vzTdnBh62rm7x-2" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="361" y="173" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="340" y="210" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="VZzwR31vzTdnBh62rm7x-37" value="5. Read certificates" style="edgeLabel;resizable=0;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;" parent="VZzwR31vzTdnBh62rm7x-36" connectable="0" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="7" y="13" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="S0fAHx6TZ2YNJfECwpG4-4" value="Registry" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="191" y="390" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="S0fAHx6TZ2YNJfECwpG4-9" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="S0fAHx6TZ2YNJfECwpG4-4" target="VZzwR31vzTdnBh62rm7x-2" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="280" y="340" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="380" y="340" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="S0fAHx6TZ2YNJfECwpG4-10" value="3. Fetch descriptor <br>and signatures" style="edgeLabel;resizable=0;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;" parent="S0fAHx6TZ2YNJfECwpG4-9" connectable="0" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="S0fAHx6TZ2YNJfECwpG4-19" value="" style="html=1;rounded=0;endArrow=none;dashed=1;fillColor=#a20025;strokeColor=#6F0000;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="501" y="370" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="150" y="368" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="S0fAHx6TZ2YNJfECwpG4-21" value="Trust boundary" style="text;html=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;labelBackgroundColor=default;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="100" y="345" width="60" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="S0fAHx6TZ2YNJfECwpG4-24" value="Credential store" style="shape=partialRectangle;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;left=0;right=0;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#000000;fontColor=#000000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="110" y="63" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="S0fAHx6TZ2YNJfECwpG4-25" value="Notation trust store" style="shape=partialRectangle;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;left=0;right=0;fillColor=none;strokeColor=#000000;fontColor=#000000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="400" y="63" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="S0fAHx6TZ2YNJfECwpG4-28" value="Notation verification plugin" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#ffffff;strokeColor=#000000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="490" y="203" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="S0fAHx6TZ2YNJfECwpG4-29" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.058;entryY=0.304;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" parent="1" target="S0fAHx6TZ2YNJfECwpG4-28" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="350" y="227" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="460" y="220" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="S0fAHx6TZ2YNJfECwpG4-30" value="6. Request validation" style="edgeLabel;resizable=0;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;" parent="S0fAHx6TZ2YNJfECwpG4-29" connectable="0" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="S0fAHx6TZ2YNJfECwpG4-31" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.046;exitY=0.746;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="491.67999999999984" y="262.67999999999995" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="348" y="263" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="S0fAHx6TZ2YNJfECwpG4-32" value="8. Return verification<br>results" style="edgeLabel;resizable=0;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;" parent="S0fAHx6TZ2YNJfECwpG4-31" connectable="0" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="1" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mScXPgTFrXe03iMTIDPM-1" value="OCSP responder" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="380" y="390" width="80" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mScXPgTFrXe03iMTIDPM-2" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;endFill=0;startArrow=classic;startFill=1;" parent="1" source="S0fAHx6TZ2YNJfECwpG4-28" target="mScXPgTFrXe03iMTIDPM-1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="370" y="300" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="470" y="300" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mScXPgTFrXe03iMTIDPM-3" value="7. (Optional) Fetch revocation status" style="edgeLabel;resizable=0;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;" parent="mScXPgTFrXe03iMTIDPM-2" connectable="0" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="-5" as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
